QuestData.Title: Out of Enemy Hands
QuestData.Description: Magic is a frightening opponent when wielded by an experienced caster. A blade however, is terrifying in even the most inexperienced hands.$b$bThe Zandalari have some impressive weapons, made even more deadly by the magic they are enhanced with. We should relieve them of this advantage.$b$bSteal as many of the weapons as you can find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Steal 7 Loa-Infused Blades from Conqueror's Terrace.
